fields.name: Basic Remedy Kit
fields.description: Eighteen of the most commonly used Homeopathic remedies for acute ailments and minor injuries. Remedies: Aconite, Apis, Arnica, Arsenicum, Belladonna, Bryonia, Cantharis, Chamomilla, Gelsemium, Hypericum, Ignatia, Ledum, Mercurius, Nux vom, Pulsatilla, Rhus tox, Ruta and Silica.

fields.name: Full Remedy Kit
fields.description: Thirty Six of the most commonly used Homeopathic remedies for acute ailments and minor injuries. Remedies:

fields.name: Aconite
fields.description: No.1 remedy for nipping colds in the bud. Useful in the early stages of colds, fevers & inflammations. No.1 remedy for acute fright. When the shock of a trauma has created intense fear & panic.

fields.name: Ant Tart
fields.description: A major remedy for coughs  where the patient is unable to expectorate & is ‘drowning in mucus’. They may feel suffocated, weak, drowsy & limp.

fields.name: Apis
fields.description: No.1 remedy for bites & stings  where there is oedematous swelling, redness, burning & stinging pains. The affected area is puffy, swollen, red & hot.

fields.name: Arnica
fields.description: No.1 remedy for injury, shock & physical exhaustion. Good for bruising resulting from falls or heavy blows and injuries due to straining & wrenching muscles.

fields.name: Arsenicum
fields.description: No.1 remedy for food poisoning especially where there is nausea, diarrhoea & vomiting. Characterised by great physical prostration with mental restlessness.

fields.name: Arg Nit
fields.description: No.1 remedy for fears & phobias. Especially useful those with a fear of flying or public speaking. It is good for anticipatory anxiety accompanied by gastro-intestinal problems; belching, flatulence & diarrhoea.

fields.name: Belladonna
fields.description: No.1 remedy for high fevers. It is indicated whenever the symptoms are violent & appear suddenly & where there is redness, heat with throbbing & dryness.

fields.name: Bellis Perenis
fields.description: No.1 remedy for trauma to the breast. It is good for bruises, sprains & concussions. It has a special affinity for injury to the soft tissues & internal organs, useful after surgery.

fields.name: Bryonia
fields.description: No.1 remedy for dry, painful coughs. Dryness of the throat accompanied by tremendous thirst. Patient lies absolutely still as all symptoms are much worse for the slightest movement.

fields.name: Calendula
fields.description: No.1 remedy for healing wounds. Very useful first aid remedy for cuts, superficial burns or scalds. It speeds up the healing process & stimulates the formation of healthy scar tissue.

fields.name: Cantharis
fields.description: No.1 remedy for burning pains. Indicated whenever symptoms are cutting & burning. Good for injures caused by burns or sunburn. No.1 remedy for cystitis especially when there are burning pains before, during and after urination.

fields.name: Carbo Veg
fields.description: No.1 remedy for resuscitation. Known as the ‘homeopathic corpse reviver’ due to its ability to help those in a state of collapse due to oxygen starvation. Good for the weak & debilitated with lung or digestive problems & shortness of breath.

fields.name: Chamomilla
fields.description: No.1 remedy for teething children. It is characterized by excessive irritability & tremendous intolerance to pain. Children requiring this remedy are furiously angry & impossible to satisfy.

fields.name: China
fields.description: No.1 remedy for exhaustion caused by  dehydration or fluid loss due to menstruation, haemorrhage, vomiting or diarrhoea. Those needing this remedy are typically weak, pale thirsty & sensitive.

fields.name: Colocynthis
fields.description: A major remedy for cramping pains  which are sudden, violent & twisting in nature. The cramping pains are often accompanied by anger & are better for bending forward, hard pressure or lying on the abdomen.

fields.name: Drosera
fields.description: No.1 remedy for whooping cough. It is good for barking, hacking coughs that are violent, spasmodic & lead to gagging, vomiting or nosebleeds. There is often a tickling sensation in the throat.

fields.name: Ferrum Phos
fields.description: A major remedy for the early stages of colds, ear, throat & chest infections or fever. Useful in early stages of illness when you cannot decide between other remedies such as Aconite, Belladonna & Gelsemium.

fields.name: Gelsemium
fields.description: No.1 remedy for colds & flu. Those needing this remedy feel physically exhausted accompanied by trembling & aching muscles with heaviness, especially of the head & eyes.

fields.name: Hepar Sulph
fields.description: No.1 remedy for infected wounds with extreme sensitivity to pain accompanied by anger, irritability & extreme chilliness. The pains are sharp & stabbing.

fields.name: Hypericum
fields.description: No.1 remedy for injury to nerves. Useful first aid remedy for lacerated wounds from sharp instruments or any injury to nerve rich areas e.g. slamming door on fingers or falling on the coccyx.

fields.name: Ignatia
fields.description: No.1 remedy for grief. Useful for treating symptoms that occur after an emotional loss or bereavement. Common symptoms include; hiccoughs, involuntary sighing or yawning, twitches & spasms.

fields.name: Ipecac
fields.description: No.1 remedy for constant, violent nausea especially when vomiting brings no relief. The nausea may be accompanied by a build up of saliva in the mouth, severe coughing, difficulties breathing & bright red haemorrhages.

fields.name: Kali Bich
fields.description: No.1 remedy for painful sinuses.  Good for colds & sinusitis. Its main characteristic is a very stringy, sticky thick yellow / green discharge. Suits those who become ill after getting chilled & are chilly whilst feeling sick.

fields.name: Lachesis
fields.description: A good remedy for sore throats  that are left sided or begin on the left & move to the right. The throat is swollen & a dark red or purple colour. The patient may not be able to wear anything around their neck or swallow liquids.

fields.name: Ledum
fields.description: No.1 remedy for puncture wounds from nails & bites from animals or insects. The wounded area is swollen, cold, pale & painful with little or no bleeding. No.1 remedy for a black eye.

fields.name: Mag Phos
fields.description: No.1 remedy for cramp & neuralgic pains. Especially when the symptoms are better with heat & pressure. Known as the homeopathic aspirin. Relieves headaches, toothaches & menstrual pain.

fields.name: Mercury
fields.description: No.1 remedy for mouth ulcers. Good for many mouth, throat, ear & nose conditions. Indications include excessive salivation, smelly breath, a foul taste in the mouth & sensitivity to both heat & cold.

fields.name: Millefolium
fields.description: No.1 remedy for nosebleeds especially after a blow or injury to the nose. Useful for haemorrhages of bright red blood after a fall or other injury. If Arnica fails to act think of Millefolium.

fields.name: Nat Mur
fields.description: No.1 remedy for cold sores especially around or on  the lips. No.1 remedy for silent grief (the stiff upper lip). The middle of the lower lip may be deeply cracked.

fields.name: Nux Vomica
fields.description: No.1 remedy for hangovers & over indulgence in rich food. Good for those who work & play hard, surviving on a diet of coffee, alcohol & tobacco.

fields.name: Pulsatilla
fields.description: No.1 remedy for childhood ear infections. The patient is moody, tearful & craves company. Children can be clingy & whine. Discharges are thick, bland & yellow-green. They are thirstless, feel worse indoors & feel better for fresh air.

fields.name: Rhus Tox
fields.description: No.1 remedy for sprains & strains. The pain is located around joints which ache and feel sore and stiff. The pains are worse on first movement, with a tearing or stitching sensation, but improve with continued motion.

fields.name: Ruta
fields.description: No.1 remedy for injuries to tendons & bone surface. It has an affinity for the connective tissue of smaller joints. It is useful for dislocations, bruises & damaged cartilage.

fields.name: Silica
fields.description: No.1 remedy for forcing out splinters. In first aid treatment excellent for forcing foreign bodies out. But beware if you have a pace-maker, grommets, metal pins etc.

fields.name: Spongia
fields.description: The No.1 remedy for dry coughs  that are hollow, barking, crowing, sawing or croupy. Breathing is difficult with the sensation of breathing through a dry sponge. The feeling of suffocation is worse around midnight.

fields.name: Staphysagria
fields.description: A useful remedy following surgery. Good for cuts made with sharp instruments. Useful remedy after surgery for patients who feel invaded or abused by the procedure.
